summary: A delirious black comedy that tells the story of Vladimir and Jorge, two best friends who move in together. Vladimir lives a supernatural life of time travel while Jorge follows a twisted ... See full summary »
cast: Diego Muñoz|Nicolás Saavedra|Javiera Díaz de Valdés|Manuela Martelli|Patricio Diaz|Mariana Derderián|Eugenio Morales|Alejandra Vega|María Cristina Peña y Lillo|Rodrigo Salinas|Alvaro Salinas|Camillo Torres|Francisco González|Lucía Baeza|Isolda Cid|Clemente Echavarry|Paula Bravo|Javiera Hernández|Aline Küppenheim|Ian Cofre
title: Malta con Huevo
